00242 // Align value 'x' to boundary 'b' which should be power of 2
00243 #define DOALIGN(x,b)   (((x) + (b) - 1) & ~((b) - 1))

00326 #define nat8_low_part(x)  ((db_nat4)(x))
00327 #define int8_low_part(x)  ((db_int4)(x))
00328 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER < 1300 // bug in MVC 6.0
00329 #define nat8_high_part(x) (sizeof(x) < 8 ? 0 : ((db_nat4)((db_nat8)(x)>>32)))
00330 #define int8_high_part(x) (sizeof(x) < 8 ? 0 : ((db_int4)((db_int8)(x)>>32)))
00331 #else
00332 #define nat8_high_part(x) ((db_nat4)((db_nat8)(x)>>32))
00333 #define int8_high_part(x) ((db_int4)((db_int8)(x)>>32))
00334 #endif
00335 
00336 #define cons_nat8(hi, lo) ((((nat8)(hi)) << 32) | (nat4)(lo))
00337 #define cons_int8(hi, lo) ((((db_int8)(hi)) << 32) | (nat4)(lo))

00457 #if NO_STRICMP
00458 inline int stricmp(const char* p, const char* q)
00459 {
00460     while (toupper(*(unsigned char*)p) == toupper(*(unsigned char*)q)) { 
00461         if (*p == '\0') { 
00462             return 0;
00463         }
00464         p += 1;
00465         q += 1;
00466     }
00467     return toupper(*(unsigned char*)p) - toupper(*(unsigned char*)q);
00468 }
00469 #endif
00470 
00471 
00472 #if NO_STRNICMP
00473 inline int strnicmp(const char* p, const char* q, size_t n)
00474 {
00475     while (n > 0) { 
00476         int diff = toupper(*(unsigned char*)p) - toupper(*(unsigned char*)q);
00477         if (diff != 0) { 
00478             return diff;
00479         } else if (*p == '\0') { 
00480             return 0;
00481         }
00482         p += 1;
00483         q += 1;
00484         n -= 1; 
00485     }
00486     return 0;
00487 }
00488 #endif
00489 
00490 #if NO_WCSICMP
00491 inline int wcsicmp(const char* p, const char* q)
00492 {
00493     while (towupper(*p) == towupper(*q)) { 
00494         if (*p == '\0') { 
00495             return 0;
00496         }
00497         p += 1;
00498         q += 1;
00499     }
00500     return towupper(*p) - towupper(*q);
00501 }
00502 #endif
00503 
00504 
00505 #if NO_WCSNICMP
00506 inline int wcsnicmp(const char* p, const char* q, size_t n)
00507 {
00508     while (n > 0) { 
00509         int diff = towupper(*p) - towupper(*q);
00510         if (diff != 0) { 
00511             return diff;
00512         } else if (*p == '\0') { 
00513             return 0;
00514         }
00515         p += 1;
00516         q += 1;
00517         n -= 1; 
00518     }
00519     return 0;
00520 }
00521 #endif
00522 
00523 #if defined(USE_LOCALE_SETTINGS) 
00524 #if NO_STRNCOLL
00525 inline int strncoll(const char* p, const char* q, size_t n)
00526 {
00527     char   p_buf[256];
00528     char   q_buf[256];
00529     size_t p_len = strlen(p);
00530     size_t q_len = strlen(q);
00531     char*  p_dst = p_buf; 
00532     char*  q_dst = q_buf; 
00533     size_t i;
00534     if (p_len > n) { 
00535         p_len = n;
00536     }
00537     if (p_len >= sizeof(p_buf)) { 
00538         p_dst = new char[p_len+1];
00539     }
00540     if (q_len > n) { 
00541         q_len = n;
00542     }
00543     if (q_len >= sizeof(q_buf)) { 
00544         q_dst = new char[q_len+1];
00545     }
00546     for (i = 0; i < p_len; i++) { 
00547         p_dst[i] = p[i];
00548     }
00549     p_dst[i] = '\0';
00550 
00551     for (i = 0; i < q_len; i++) { 
00552         q_dst[i] = q[i];
00553     }
00554     q_dst[i] = '\0';
00555 
00556     int diff = strcoll(p_dst, q_dst);
00557     if (p_dst != p_buf) { 
00558         delete[] p_dst;
00559     }
00560     if (q_dst != q_buf) { 
00561         delete[] q_dst;
00562     }
00563     return diff;
00564 }
00565 #endif
00566 
00567 #if NO_STRNICOLL
00568 inline int strnicoll(const char* p, const char* q, size_t n)
00569 {
00570     char   p_buf[256];
00571     char   q_buf[256];
00572     size_t p_len = strlen(p);
00573     size_t q_len = strlen(q);
00574     char*  p_dst = p_buf; 
00575     char*  q_dst = q_buf; 
00576     size_t i;
00577     if (p_len > n) { 
00578         p_len = n;
00579     }
00580     if (p_len >= sizeof(p_buf)) { 
00581         p_dst = new char[p_len+1];
00582     }
00583     if (q_len > n) { 
00584         q_len = n;
00585     }
00586     if (q_len >= sizeof(q_buf)) { 
00587         q_dst = new char[q_len+1];
00588     }
00589     for (i = 0; i < p_len; i++) { 
00590         p_dst[i] = toupper(p[i] & 0xFF);
00591     }
00592     p_dst[i] = '\0';
00593 
00594     for (i = 0; i < q_len; i++) { 
00595         q_dst[i] = toupper(q[i] & 0xFF);
00596     }
00597     q_dst[i] = '\0';
00598 
00599     int diff = strcoll(p_dst, q_dst);
00600     if (p_dst != p_buf) { 
00601         delete[] p_dst;
00602     }
00603     if (q_dst != q_buf) { 
00604         delete[] q_dst;
00605     }
00606     return diff;
00607 }
00608 #endif
00609 
00610 #if NO_STRICOLL
00611 inline int stricoll(const char* p, const char* q)
00612 {
00613     char   p_buf[256];
00614     char   q_buf[256];
00615     size_t p_len = strlen(p);
00616     size_t q_len = strlen(q);
00617     char*  p_dst = p_buf; 
00618     char*  q_dst = q_buf; 
00619     int    i;
00620     if (p_len >= sizeof(p_buf)) { 
00621         p_dst = new char[p_len+1];
00622     }
00623     if (q_len >= sizeof(q_buf)) { 
00624         q_dst = new char[q_len+1];
00625     }
00626     for (i = 0; p[i] != '\0'; i++) { 
00627         p_dst[i] = toupper(p[i] & 0xFF);
00628     }
00629     p_dst[i] = '\0';
00630 
00631     for (i = 0; q[i] != '\0'; i++) { 
00632         q_dst[i] = toupper(q[i] & 0xFF);
00633     }
00634     q_dst[i] = '\0';
00635 
00636     int diff = strcoll(p_dst, q_dst);
00637     if (p_dst != p_buf) { 
00638         delete[] p_dst;
00639     }
00640     if (q_dst != q_buf) { 
00641         delete[] q_dst;
00642     }
00643     return diff;
00644 }
00645 #endif
00646 #endif
